title: Track Awesome Maintainers Updates Daily
_seo_title: Track Awesome Maintainers (nayafia/awesome-maintainers) Updates Daily - Track Awesome List
description: Talks, blog posts, and interviews about the experience of being an open source maintainer

  • @stewartsmith, Skiboot (⭐108)
    • "Organizational Change: Challenges in shipping open source firmware" (video)

items.title: Awesome Maintainers Updates on Feb 06, 2018
items.content_text:
*   [@janl](https://github.com/janl), [CouchDB (⭐6.6k)](https://github.com/apache/couchdb)
    *   "Sustainable Open Source: The Maintainers Perspective or: How I Learned to Stop Caring and Love Open Source" ([post](http://writing.jan.io/2017/03/06/sustainable-open-source-the-maintainers-perspective-or-how-i-learned-to-stop-caring-and-love-open-source.html))

items.title: Awesome Maintainers Updates on Feb 05, 2018
items.content_text:
*   [@ariya](https://github.com/ariya), [PhantomJS (⭐29k)](https://github.com/ariya/phantomjs)

*   [@boneskull](https://github.com/boneskull), [Mocha (⭐23k)](https://github.com/mochajs/mocha)

*   [@danielbachhuber](https://github.com/danielbachhuber), [wp-cli (⭐5k)](https://github.com/wp-cli/wp-cli)

    *   "My condolences, you're now the maintainer of a popular open source project" ([video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ll_lmDZUD4o), [post](https://danielbachhuber.com/2016/06/26/my-condolences-youre-now-the-maintainer-of-a-popular-open-source-project/))

*   [@jeresig](https://github.com/jeresig), [jQuery (⭐60k)](https://github.com/jquery/jquery)

*   [@jessfraz](https://github.com/jessfraz), [Kubernetes](https://github.com/kubernetes)

*   [@kris-nova](https://github.com/kris-nova), [kubernetes-kops (⭐16k)](https://github.com/kubernetes/kops)

*   [@kytrinyx](https://github.com/kytrinyx), [Exercism](https://github.com/exercism)

*   [@Seldaek](https://github.com/Seldaek), [Composer (⭐29k)](https://github.com/composer/composer)

    *   "Maintainer Stories: Tim Graham" ([interview](https://github.com/open-source/stories/timgraham))
